note.p: Education: Magdalen College School; Magdalen College, Oxford. MA

Career: Fellow of Magdalen College, Oxford; Lecturer, Corpus Christi College, Oxford (1884-1893); Waynflete Professor of Mathematics, Oxford (1892-1921); publications included 'Algebra of Quantics' (1893)
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1936-1938 vol 2 pp 425-431, plate, by H W Turnbull
